attributes.action: Make transition arrangements for the recent IHT threshold increases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government left IHT allowances alone for a very long time and then made a major step moving from a 300K allowance to a 600k allowance.
Itis unfair to make such a change without transition arrangements.Dying one day later makes 120K difference
